title: Coronavirus testing could be expanded to catch the virus even before it appears
description: Deputy Chief Medical Officer Paul Kelly flags another expansion of Australia's coronavirus testing regime, to include places and people who are seemingly virus-free.
content:
Updated 
April 18, 2020 16:34:56
Deputy Chief Medical Officer Paul Kelly has flagged another expansion of Australia's coronavirus testing regime, to include places and people who are seemingly virus-free.
